guidance-explanation: learnt enough skills to complete it and can get help from teachers
sw: can test if you can apply these skills, you learn better than essays and examinations but maybe weak in theory and some rules

guidance-explanation: Coupled with additional materials, it is just a matter of time in completing the coursework. Also, online material helps too
academic-explanation: It is practical to give students space/coursework to apply skills they've acquired
sw: Strengths: allow students to apply the skills that they have learned - Weakness: it takes time and a lot of guidance for students to complete the coursework as opposed to exams
changes: nothing

guidance-explanation: clear direction and explanation on coursework sheet
academic-explanation: It will examine whether students have learned or not, and that's the major goal for course assessment
sw: Stregnths: practising skills learned, Making creation that could be shown to others. Weaknesses: nothing much
changes: The topic, which was set on MSc courses could be wider. It is a little bit boring to make a website for our courses (sorry but it's true)

guidance-explanation: The course was broken down into weeks learning different and new wlements which allowed me to grasp the material far more easily
academic-explanation: It teaches you something implicitly and then tests what you have learned in a very short period of time
sw: Strengths: material was explained well, examples provided lots of online videos allowed content to be learned outside of lectures; Weaknesses: Course content was very heavy, steep learning curve which did not allow for higher marks in a short space of time
changes: More coursework sessions where you can work on coursework and get aid if you get stuck. This enables you to consider more challenging projects

guidance-explanation: Lectures were thorough with plenty of practical time to get to grips with what was covered. A lot of extra learning material was provided and interactivity between lecturer and student was good
academic-explanation: It ensures that the student actually understands what they are doing and provides a great deal of practice time with the subject matter
sw: Strengths: a lot of flexibility granted to give the student freedom of creativity and the ability to add what they want into the website. Excellent lectures and support material provided. Ample time given to complete work; Weaknesses: Some best practices not covered beforehand (e.g. use of single CSS sheet)
changes: A more open-ended project  would have been more engaging rather than having to make a website for a specific subject. However, this more accurately represents tasks likely to be given to a web developer

academic-explanation: For learning how to build web applications actually building them is the best way to do this. Although written exams in computer languages are probably more academically rigorous when the aim is to learn that language, it is more important that the module takes its end goal into account when deciding how to assess students.
sw: Very good introduction to building a website and testing code, but little emphasis on some of the great pains taken just before launching a real website e.g cross browser testing (wasn't required)
changes: Some useful tools for the project were given after the coursework was handed out which may have led to developing bad practices from the start for some people. It may be useful to hand out the coursework later otherwise starting early has few benefits

guidance-explanation: yass
academic-explanation: sure
sw: strength: limited content choices make resulting websites comparable; weakness: limited content choice does not inspire creative design approach
changes: it's fine the way it is I guess

sw: limited choice of subject matter was not exactly motivating. Difficult to feel enthusiastic about. I suppose this does allow one ti concentrate on technical aspects and not content creation
changes: perhaps  a limited set of choices that are less prosaic and don't demand such generic, corporate design

academic-explanation: yes it needed a lot of attention and focus
sw: I don't think you will learn as much as you did doing the project if you had given an exam. That was a positive, can't think of any weaknesses
changes: Wouldn't change anything, was good as it was. Learnt a lot in the process

guidance-explanation: We were given enough information in lectures to help us research and explore the topics more fully in our own time to complete the assessment effectively
sw: It helped develop basic and fundamental web coding skills that would be a crucial foundation to future skills development. A sense of accomplishment as students made something that could be use and was entirely theirs. Perhaps a more interesting web theme to encourage more creativity and depth of learning
changes: The theme + topic of website creation

guidance-explanation: The mark scheme was clear and the skills taught in class were sufficient to complete the assignment
sw: The design aspect is very subjective, especially the physical appearance of the website
changes: A bit more detail about what was required in the written report would have been useful. Anything that requires reflection or self-evaluation is, again, very subjective, so a few more pointers may have been helpful

sw: Strengths: useful; Weakness: takes too much time to complete
changes: More guidance in the tutorial sessions. Cover more topics in the lectures

guidance-explanation: Gafon digon o wybodaeth I gwblhau'r dasg fel gore gallwn / We were given enough information to complete the task the best we could

academic-explanation: Mae'n dod a elfen o greadigrwydd sy'n bwysif rhwng ysgrifennu traethodau hir.  Rhoi mwy o ryddid I unigolyn ac yn cynnig ochr ymarferol / it brings an element of creativity which is important in between writing essays.  It gives us more freedom and offers a practical element
